name: The Dossier
description:
A point and click puzzle game made in under 24 hours featuring suits, dining rooms and pirates.

You have been given a dossier on a specific induvidual in the room (RMB) inspect everyone closely and listen to what they have to say to deduce who your target is.

Online leaderboards available at: thedossier.esy.es

Made in GameMaker 1.4 

Owen Lyons - Lead Programmer and Composer

Harvey Cash - Writer and Lead Designer

Will Humphreys - Artist

Joseph Cheverton-Wyne - Web Developer

Music written in Famitracker
